quotes: Too much sanity may be madness and the maddest of all, to see life as it is and not as it should be.
If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters.
Life is a challenge, meet it! Life is a dream, realize it! Life is a game, play it! Life is love, enjoy it!
If you are lucky enough to find love, remember it is there and don't throw it away.
The businessman's tool is value.
I am who I am today because of the choices I made yesterday.
Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
I do not exist to impress the world. I exist to live my life in a way that will make me happy.
Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.
Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert's mind there are few.
We crave for new sensations but soon become indifferent to them. The wonders of yesterday are today common occurrences
Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
Everyone is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.
Pain doesn't last. And when it's gone, we have something to show for it. Growth.
You can start changing our world for the better daily, no matter how small the action.
Formal education will make you a living, self-education will make you a fortune.
Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
In nature there is no alienation. Everything belongs.
A needle is not sharp at both ends.
Be a good animal, true to your instincts.
Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions.
You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
Anger exceeding limits causes fear and excessive kindness eliminates respect.
The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings.
Those who look for the bad in people will surely find it.
I no doubt deserved my enemies, but I don't believe I deserved my friends.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
The whole world is a series of miracles, but we're so used to them we call them ordinary things.
It's much better to do good in a way that no one knows anything about it.
The secret of happiness is not in doing what you like but in liking what you have to do.
Any game becomes important when you know and love the players.
Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.
Note that this journey is uniquely yours, no one elses. So the path has to be your own.
The power to make and break habits and learning how to do that is really important.
Live in each season as it passes; breathe the air, drink the drink, taste the fruit, and resign yourself to the influence of the earth.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Silence is a source of great strength.
The golden opportunity you are seeking is in yourself. It is not in your environment; it is not in luck or chance, or the help of others; it is in yourself alone.
You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.
Any fool can paint a picture, but it takes a wise man to be able to sell it.
To some degree, you control your life by controlling your time.
Humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.
We forge the chains we wear in life.
I love fools' experiments. I am always making them.
Curiosity is the most powerful thing you own. Imagination is a force that can actually manifest a reality.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
